Hengyu Liu

Postdoctoral Researcher, Aalborg University

heli [AT] cs.aau.dk

  • Bio

  • Resume

Bio

I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at the computer science department in Aalborg university. My research interests include Energy Data Management, Spatial-temporal Data Management, Education Data Management, and Digital Twin Technology.
